data.message: Dear sir plz help me plz i can't send message any one new friend or new id  when i send message anyone then its say.....→Action Blocked You have been temporarily blocked from performing this action.   please sir help me kindly...... when i can send message anyone.

replies.message:
Hi there. If you're temporarily blocked from sending messages, it may be because you sent a lot of messages recently or your messages have been marked as unwelcome.
This block is temporary, and you can still use other Facebook features to connect with your Facebook friends while you're in this block. You can learn more in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2hf6GJy. -Anna
